text: following on from showcasing the
historical metrics dashboard
in this demo you will learn how to save
update and download historical metrics
and reports
before we start generating historical
metric reports please ensure you have
access permissions to create save and
download reports
select the type of report and metrics
you would like to view from queues
Agents and phone numbers for this demo
let's select queues contact metrics
before saving the report you can choose
to customize the report by selecting
what data should be included under table
settings located in the top right hand
corner of the table select the interval
and time range
let's select the interval to be daily
next in the groupings tab you can group
The metrics included in your reports in
different ways to provide greater
insights into how your contact center is
performing group your metrics by agents
routing profile phone number and channel
let's select agent as order 3
and routing profile as order 4.
in the filters tab you can add filters
based on the Queue routing profile agent
hierarchy phone number and channel
let's select demo queues
lastly under metrics you can add
additional fields to the report
let's select agent interaction and hold
time
and customer hold time
click the save button near the top right
head corner to save the report and give
a name to the report
and save it
let's give the name as demo report
if you want to update a saved report for
example if you want to update the time
range of the save report go to analytics
and optimization
select save reports
and click historical metrics tab
select the report that was we saved
earlier
let's make a change to this report by
selecting a Time range of last 30 days
now you can either save this report
with the same name
by clicking on save or you can select
the save as option to save this report
with a different name
in cases where you want to use
historical metrics Report with other
application the historical metrics
report has a feature that's allow you to
download the file as CSV
choose the down arrow next to the save
in the top right corner of the page and
choose download CSV
when prompted confirm whether to open or
save a file
this is what the downloaded historical
metric reports looks like
although the time in the online reports
are in our minutes and seconds
all times in the downloaded reports are
in seconds
thank you for joining me in learning how
to save
update and download historical metrics
and reports
